title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 64 cm [25"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 11 cm [4.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 66 cm [26"] Cut both sides.
c. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 28 cm [11"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. green ground with bright pink and dark green floral motifs with ribbons
b. green gound with gold and dark green floral motifs with ribbons
c. dark red ground with white and green floral motif with ribbons
